briefTitle: Study of Zoledronic Acid for Patients With Hormone-sensitive Bone Metastases From Prostate Cancer

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* prostate cancer
* at least one bone metastasis
* receiving or about to receive androgen deprivation therapy (ADT)

Exclusion Criteria:

* previous ADT failure
* previous or current treatment with another bone-protecting agent, chemotherapy or targeted therapy
* abnormal renal function

Other protocol-defined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.

outcomeMeasures.title: Skeletal-related Event-free Survival in Men With Bone Metastases From Prostate Cancer
outcomeMeasures.description: Skeletal-related event free survival is the time from randomization until the first detected Skeletal Related Event (SRE). Patients who were still SRE-free at 18 months were censored.

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Survival at 18 Months and 3 Years
outcomeMeasures.description: Overall survival (OS) time was measured from the start of study drug to the date of death due to any cause.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Occurrence of Skeletal Related Event or Death
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from randomization to the first detected skeletal related event or death. This endpoint is the same as the primary endpoint with the modification that deaths are considered events.

outcomeMeasures.title: Skeletal-related Event(SRE)-Free Survival
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from randomization until the first detected SRE. Patients who were still SRE-free at 3 years were censored.

outcomeMeasures.title: Time to Occurrence of Skeletal Related Event or Death
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from randomization to the first detected skeletal related event or death. This endpoint is the same as the primary endpoint with the modification that deaths are considered events.
